<title level="1" pfs="">[Gomwai](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1466)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 40

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Gomwai](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1466)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Goblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=81" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 48

**Perception** +21; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Tien](/Languages.aspx?ID=43)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +22, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[_bracers of armor_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=416), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [handwraps of mighty blows](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 33 

**Fort** +26 

**Ref** +23 

**Will** +20 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 235

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_fist_ +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 2d6+10 bludgeoning

**Flurry of Blows** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) Gomwai makes two Strikes with his fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

**Flurry of Maneuvers**   Gomwai can replace one or both of his attacks during a Flurry of Blows with [Grapples](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), [Shoves](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trips](/Actions.aspx?ID=40).

**Powerful Fists**   Gomwai's fist Strikes are treated as [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) and [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) and don't take penalties when making lethal attacks.

**Stunning Fist**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) When Gomwai targets the same creature with two Strikes from his Flurry of Blows, he can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or be [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) (or stunned 3 on a critical failure).

</column>
name: Gomwai
primary_source_raw: Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 48

text: Gomwai Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 40 Unspecific Lore : DC 38 Specific Lore : DC 35 Gomwai Source Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 48 Perception +21; darkvision Languages Common, Goblin, Tien Skills Acrobatics +22, Athletics +27, Intimidation +24, Stealth +22, Underworld Lore +20 Str +5 Dex +4 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +0 Items bracers of armor , +1 striking handwraps of mighty blows --- AC 33 Fort +26 Ref +23 Will +20 HP 235 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action fist +25 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 2d6+10 bludgeoning Flurry of Blows Single Action (Flourish) Gomwai makes two Strikes with his fist. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Flurry of Maneuvers Gomwai can replace one or both of his attacks during a Flurry of Blows with Grapples, Shoves, or Trips. Powerful Fists Gomwai's fist Strikes are treated as cold iron and silver and don't take penalties when making lethal attacks. Stunning Fist (Incapacitation) When Gomwai targets the same creature with two Strikes from his Flurry of Blows, he can try to stun the creature. If either Strike hits and deals damage, the target must succeed at a DC 30 Fortitude save or be stunned 1 (or stunned 3 on a critical failure).
